## GridComponent.getPlugin() method

Gets instance of plugin by its id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPlugin<PluginType extends GridPlugin>(pluginId: string): PluginType;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pluginId | <code>string</code> | Id of plugin, use constants |

<b>Returns:</b>

`PluginType`
